mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_prompt_history ( user_id, prompt_id, request_input, gemini_response, is_success, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{promptId}, #{requestInput}, #{geminiResponse}, #{isSuccess}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_prompt_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE(created_at) = CURRENT_DATE() ORDER BY history_id DESC LIMIT 1
